Trade/Device Name(s): Omega Laboratories Hair Drug Screening Assay for Methamphetamine and MDMA
Omega Laboratories Hair Drug Screening Assay Methamphetamine
Omega Laboratories Hair Drug Screening Assay Methamphetamine and 4-Methylenedioxymethamphetamine (MDMA)
Regulation Name(s): Enzyme immunoassay, Methamphetamine Methamphetamine test System
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Omega Laboratories Hair Drug Screening Assay for qualitative detection of methamphetamine and MDMA in hair using ELISA and GC/MS confirmation.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative detection of methamphetamine and MDMA in human hair from the crown of the head for the purpose of identifying use, for in-house laboratory use only.
